title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be ''Hyperlink Options'', now it changes with settings.
description: The title of hyperlink builder should be ''Hyperlink Options'', now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of the hyperlink builder becomes ''www.actuate.com'' instead of ''Hyperlink Options'' after closing and reopening it.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be ''Hyperlink Options'' and should not change with settings.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a label hyperlink as ''www.actuate.com''. 2. Click on ''OK'' to save and close the hyperlink builder. 3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
